evaluationExamples.prompt: How many three way intersections are there on the map?

memoryItems.query: MATCH (r:Road) WHERE r.junctionId <> '-1' RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT r.junctionId)

memoryItems.prompt: What roads are going in to an intersection?
memoryItems.query: MATCH(r1:Road)-[HAS_LANE]->(l1:Lane)-[PRECEDES]->(l2:Lane)-[ON_ROAD]->(r2:Road) WHERE r1.junctionId = '-1' AND r2.junctionId <> '-1' RETURN DISTINCT r1.id

evaluationExamples.prompt: How many roads are turning but are not part of a junction?

memoryItems.prompt: How many roads are there on the map?
memoryItems.query: MATCH (r: Road) RETURN COUNT(r) as amount_of_roads

memoryItems.prompt: Which roads are not part of a junction?

evaluationExamples.prompt: Give me roads which are at the most 45m long, connected to an intersection which has a left turn with the connected road being at least 150m long. I want the road id of the both roads, as well as the intersection id.

memoryItems.prompt: How many roads are going straight?

evaluationExamples.prompt: Give me a route which is between 400 and 500 meters long, involves three turns, at least one of them being a left turn. The route should take a minimum of 30 seconds to drive when driving in the speed limit of the road. Return the ids of the roads in the route.
